name: FVirtualTextureSpacePoolConfig
doc: Settings for a single virtual texture physical pool.

Formats: Formats of the layers in the physical pool. Leave empty to match any format.
MinTileSize: Minimum tile size to match (including tile border).
MaxTileSize: Maximum tile size to match (including tile border). Set to 0 to match any tile size.
SizeInMegabyte: Upper limit size in megabytes to allocate for the pool. The allocator will allocate as close as possible below this limit.
bEnableResidencyMipMapBias: Enable MipMapBias based on pool residency tracking.
bAllowSizeScale: Allow the size to allocate for the pool to be scaled by scalability settings.
MinScaledSizeInMegabyte: Lower limit of size in megabytes to allocate for the pool after size scaling.
MaxScaledSizeInMegabyte: Upper limit of size in megabytes to allocate for the pool after size scaling. Set to 0 to ignore.
